programme.title: 27 Dresses
programme.desc: Anne Fletcher's rom-com stars Katherine Heigl as Jane, an amateur wedding planner for her friends who hopes to be the blushing bride herself (eventually) to her advertising executive boss George. Her hopes are dashed when her fun-loving gorgeous sister Tess appears on the scene and sweeps him off his feet, leaving Jane to plan yet another wedding. But maybe there's hope for her in the shape of Kevin, a journalist who is intrigued by Jane's perpetual bridesmaid role and wants to write a story about her if only they didn't mix like oil and water..(n)

programme.title: Standing Still
programme.desc: When a diverse group of lifelong friends comes together to celebrate the marriage of devoted couple Elise (Amy Adams) and Michael (Adam Garcia), the mixed-up relationships of the past pave the road to a weekend no one is likely to soon forget in the feature debut from filmmaker Matthew Cole Weiss. The setting is Los Angeles, CA, and the event is the wedding between a man and a woman who always seemed destined to be together. Unfortunately, all relationships can't be as healthy as Elise and Michael's is, and though best man and maid of honor Rich (Aaron Stanford) and Samantha (Melissa Sagemiller) seem to be preparing to take the plunge, the same certainly cannot be said for neurotic actress Lana (Mena Suvari). A free-spirited soul who has experienced flings with a variety of wedding attendees including the hapless Pockets (Jon Abrahams), alcoholic actor Simon (James Van Der Beek), and manic children's television program host Donovan (Ethan Embry), Lana attempts to sort out her past flings as lovelorn agent Quentin (Colin Hanks) pines for the bride's sister and the estranged father of the groom attempts to reconnect with his long-lost son(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: An aquarium cleaner who is down on his luck turns to prostitution in an attempt to get out of debt(n)

programme.title: Cry-Baby
programme.desc: A parody of 1950s teen musicals involving a bad boy who falls for a rich girl(n)

programme.title: The Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: Workaholic estate agent Jim and his family become trapped in creepy Gracey Mansion as the ghostly owner needs them to lift an ancient curse(n)

programme.title: Jem and the Holograms
programme.desc: A small-town teen's singing video goes viral and catapults her and her sister's band into global superstardom, but their newfound fame threatens to break apart their familial bonds(n)

programme.title: Barbershop 2: Back in Business
programme.desc: Kevin Rodney Sullivan steps in to direct the urban comedy sequel Barbershop 2: Back in Business. The whole gang -- Eddie (Cedric the Entertainer), Jimmy James (Sean Patrick Thomas), Terri (Eve), Isaac (Troy Garity), Ricky (Michael Ealy), and Dinka (Leonard Earl Howze) -- are still there in the same old barbershop in the south side of Chicago. Owner Calvin Palmer (Ice Cube) tries to keep his family business alive in order to pass it on to his own son one day. However, the beloved neighborhood barber shop is threatened by a hair salon franchise called Nappy Cuts. This time around, the old friends are joined by Gina (Queen Latifah) from the beauty shop next door(n)

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: Jason Reitman's comedy drama stars Oscar-nominee Ellen Page as Juno McGuff, 16 and pregnant after an encounter with on-off boyfriend Paulie Bleeker. She tells her father Mac and mother Bren she intends to have the baby and then hand it over for adoption. In the pages of the PennySaver, she finds childless couple Vanessa and Mark Loring who look like the ideal couple. But, as the months progress and her stomach swells, Juno begins to doubt both them and her course of action. Oscar-winning Diablo Cody's whip-smart script keeps the laughs coming and the action moving in one of the most lauded movies of recent years(n)

programme.title: The Fabulous Baker Boys
programme.desc: Piano-playing brothers, one a prodigy, the other mediocre, meet a chanteuse who livens up their act but whose affair with one may break them up(n)

programme.title: Transamerica
programme.desc: Felicity Huffman gives an Oscar-nominated performance as a man on the verge of having a sex-change operation who discovers that he has a 17-year-old son (Kevin Zegers). Fionnula Flanagan, Graham Greene. Huffman's husband, William H. Macy, is the executive producer. Written and directed by Duncan Tucker(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: Sen. Bernie Sanders (Ind.-Vt.) and former representative Barney Frank are the interview guests. The panelists are editors Alex Wagner (Atlantic) and Matt Welch (Reason), and scholar Cornel West(n)

programme.title: Cheech and Chong's Next Movie
programme.desc: Richard Marin and Thomas Chong's misadventures as bumbling musicians(n)

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: A Trusty Steed. A school evaluator's arrival rattles Gamby and Russell, who cross boundaries with Dr. Brown(n)

programme.title: Vice Principals
programme.desc: The Field Trip. Danny wants to impress Amanda on a field trip organized by history teacher Mr. Hayden(n)

programme.title: Not Another Teen Movie
programme.desc: Comedy spoof of teen high school movies from the last 20 years, in which a dim sportsman vows to transform an ugly girl into the prom queen. Parodied films include She's All That, The Breakfast Club, Risky Business and American Pie(n)

programme.title: Juno
programme.desc: Jason Reitman's comedy drama stars Oscar-nominee Ellen Page as Juno McGuff, 16 and pregnant after an encounter with on-off boyfriend Paulie Bleeker. She tells her father Mac and mother Bren she intends to have the baby and then hand it over for adoption. In the pages of the PennySaver, she finds childless couple Vanessa and Mark Loring who look like the ideal couple. But, as the months progress and her stomach swells, Juno begins to doubt both them and her course of action. Oscar-winning Diablo Cody's whip-smart script keeps the laughs coming and the action moving in one of the most lauded movies of recent years(n)

programme.title: 28 Weeks Later
programme.desc: Sequel to the apocalyptic thriller "28 Days Later" (2002) finds Londoners returning after the killer virus has been eradicated, or has it?

programme.title: Next Friday
programme.desc: In this sequel to Friday, Ice Cube returns as the streetwise LA dude who grassed up a local gangster. Who's now out and on his trail. This would be a good time to chill out in the suburbs with cousin Mike Epps and uncle Don 'Dc' Curry, who happens to have won the lottery but, as he finds out, money can't buy you love or security in Steve Carr's smart comedy

programme.title: Eight Legged Freaks
programme.desc: From the producers of Independence Day and Godzilla. Spilled toxic waste results in giant jumping, weaving and trapdoor spiders that attack a small town in this fun comedy starring David Arquette, Kari Wührer and Scarlett Johansson

programme.title: Flight of the Conchords
programme.sub-title: Love Is the Weapon of Choice
programme.desc: Love Is the Weapon of Choice. Bret and Jemaine become rivals for the attentions of the same woman (Kristen Wiig), who happens to have an epileptic dog that has gone missing

programme.title: Unfriended
programme.desc: One year after a humiliating viral video drove a teen to commit suicide, her high-school classmates are terrorised by an anonymous online presence seeking revenge

programme.title: The Salton Sea
programme.desc: Strange thriller told in flashbacks about Danny Parker, a speed-using trumpet player determined to cope with his drug madness and avenge the murder of his wife by corrupt cops

programme.title: Paper Towns
programme.desc: A nerdy teenager falls for the enigmatic girl next door, who vanishes after the two have an adventure together one night. She leaves behind a trail of clues, which lead him and his friends to go on a road trip to find her

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen
programme.desc: Second sequel to the remake of the 1960 Rat Pack caper finds suave con man Danny Ocean and his crew plotting to rob a casino owner who double-crossed Danny's mentor

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: In a sun-parched, postapocalyptic future, loner Max gets caught up in the plight of a group of warrior women as they flee from an evil despot across a desert wasteland

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: It was supposed to be a cool camping weekend for five friends after graduation. But everything changes when a stranger with a horrific, infectious skin condition shows up

programme.title: The Ruins
programme.desc: Gruesome horror about a group of American twentysomethings whose Mexican holiday takes a grisly turn. When a German holidaymaker begs the travellers to help find his brother, who went missing exploring an ancient Mayan temple, the group agrees to offer their assistance. Unfortunately, the mercy mission turns into a desperate fight for survival as the tourists discover that something deeply unpleasant is waiting for them in the ruins. Adapted from the novel by Scott B Smith

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A TV producer seeks to expose a tobacco industry cover-up with the aid of an ex-research scientist, but winds up fighting a battle on multiple fronts when the network balks at airing the story

programme.title: Mad Max: Fury Road
programme.desc: In a sun-parched, postapocalyptic future, loner Max gets caught up in the plight of a group of warrior women as they flee from an evil despot across a desert wasteland

programme.title: Van Helsing
programme.desc: Hugh Jackman and Kate Beckinsale star in writer-director Stephen Sommers' breathless, all-action roller-coaster of a CGI monster-hunt. It's the late 19th century and a secret organisation within the Vatican is determinedly pursuing its ages-old mission to ensure the extinction of all supernatural beings that threaten mankind. Their star creature-killer is Gabriel Van Helsing, who starts the movie in Paris, where he's on the trail of a rampaging Mr Hyde. Van Helsing is then dispatched to Transylvania, where his assignment is to assist Princess Anna Valerious in her long-standing quest to defeat Count Dracula. Van Helsing is abetted by the ingenious but timid and risk-averse Carl, who churns out a stream of gadgets and weapons (much in the manner of James Bond's inventor Q) for our warrior hero. But the undead nobleman awaits them, and he has forged an unlikely but deadly alliance with other supernaturals... It's not the most intellectually challenging of films, but it's certainly a thrilling horror-tinged fairground ride

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: With the help of his best friend John, a sentient teddy bear named Ted fights to be legally recognized as a human so he can have a child with his new wife Tami-Lynn. This gut-busting comedy is a sequel to the 2012 surprise hit

programme.title: Capote
programme.desc: An exemplary biopic that focuses on the six years Capote spent working on his 1966 masterpiece "In Cold Blood"

programme.title: Prelude to a Kiss
programme.desc: Adaptation of Craig Lucas's play, concerning an unusual occurrence at the wedding reception of a Chicago couple (Alec Baldwin, Meg Ryan). Leah: Kathy Bates. Dr. Boyle: Ned Beatty. Mrs. Boyle: Patty Duke. Jerry: Richard Riehle. Old Man: Sydney Walker. Taylor: Stanley Tucci. Tom: Rocky Carroll. Directed by Norman Rene

programme.title: Olive Kitteridge
programme.desc: Pharmacy; Incoming Tide. In the first two parts of this four-part adaptation of Elizabeth Strout's Pulitzer Prize-winning novel spanning 25 years in a small Maine town, math teacher Olive Kitteridge helps Kevin, a smart but timid student whose mom is suffering from depression, a gesture that annoys her son, Christopher. Years later, the twentysomething Kevin returns to the area, and Olive ropes him into attending Christopher's wedding-rehearsal dinner

programme.title: Olive Kitteridge
programme.desc: A Different Road; Security. In the final two parts, Christopher suggests counseling to his mother after she and Henry have a scary episode following dinner with friends. Later, Olive visits Christopher and his second wife in New York, but abruptly returns to Maine, where she gets some bad news about Henry and ultimately befriends a lonely widower she meets while out for a walk

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Romantic fantasy cum thriller in which a man killed by a mugger returns as his young girlfriend's ghostly guardian. Realising, in his spirit state, that his murder was premeditated and that her life is in great danger, he tries to make contact through a fake spiritualist. But will his girlfriend take the woman seriously?

programme.title: Making of 'Jurassic World'
programme.desc: A look at "Jurassic World" (2015), the fourth installment in the "Jurassic Park" series that unfolds 22 years after the 1993 original and features a new dinosaur theme park on Isla Nubar. The film stars Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard and Vincent D'Onofrio, and is directed by Colin Trevorrow

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials
programme.desc: Thomas and the other Gladers journey across a brutal, obstacle-filled wasteland called the Scorch. Along the way, they search for information regarding the mysterious organisation known as WCKD

programme.title: The Insider
programme.desc: A TV producer seeks to expose a tobacco industry cover-up with the aid of an ex-research scientist, but winds up fighting a battle on multiple fronts when the network balks at airing the story

programme.title: Lucy
programme.desc: Synthetic drugs give a woman superhuman powers, which she uses to strike back against the Asian gangsters who kidnapped her and tried to use her as a mule. In time, her increased intelligence causes her to become disconnected from the rest of humanity(r)

programme.title: The Transporter
programme.desc: An outlaw finds his life becoming all the more dangerous when he turns against a gang of criminals in this action drama. Frank Martin (Jason Statham) is a former Special Forces officer who lives on the French Mediterranean and has a lucrative second career as a underworld courier for hire. Martin will deliver anything anywhere, but he has three iron-clad rules - once the plan is in motion it cannot be changed, neither he nor his customers are to ever use their real names, and under no circumstances will he open the package. Martin is hired to make a delivery to a wealthy but unscrupulous American known as Wall Street (Matt Schulze), but after taking possession of the package he realizes that whatever is inside happens to be alive. Breaking his own rule, Martin opens the bag to discover a beautiful Asian woman, Lai (Shu Qi), who is bound and gagged. Lai briefly escapes, but Martin captures her, and delivers her to Wall Street as promised. However, after being given a parcel to deliver by Wall Street, Martin finds out what Wall Street is up to - in partnership with Lai's father Mr. Kwai (Ric Young), Wall Street is part of a scheme to smuggle Asian illegal aliens into France. Martin's conscience gets the better of him, and he sets out to rescue Lai and put Wall Street and Mr. Kwai out of business; however, as if this wasn't enough of a challenge, Martin discovers a French detective, Tarconi (Francois Berleand) has gotten wind of his illegal business. The Transporter was the first English-language feature for Hong Kong-based director Corey Yuen, who along with directing a number of HK action flicks designed fight choreography for several American films(r)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Elidee. Vernon's advised to keep mum about how he got injured; Spencer and Joe clash over the handling of a client as they fend off Andre's threats; Charles isn't sure he's ready for a new challenge; Ricky thinks about relocating(r)

programme.title: The Maze Runner: The Scorch Trials (?)
Magic Mike XXL
programme.desc: Retired male stripper Magic Mike (Channing Tatum) decides to help his friends put on one last show, as the crew embark on a road trip to Myrtle Beach to perform at an exotic-dance convention. Along the way, they brighten the lives of several women, including an aspiring photographer (Amber Heard) and a diva (Jada Pinkett Smith) from Mike's past(r)

programme.title: Snatch
programme.desc: Violent comedy crime caper centred around three groups of villains intent on retrieving a missing diamond. Two friends team up with a pugilistic gypsy to fix a boxing match, but their opponent also arranges some dodgy betting with the courier of the stolen diamond, who subsequently goes missing. When a gangster from New York arrives on the scene, things really start to get complicated(n)

programme.title: South Central
programme.desc: Glenn Plummer delivers a powerful performance in this angry film based on Crips, a novel written by South Central Los Angeles high school teacher Donald Baker, and directed by Steve Anderson, who served time in prison. Plummer plays Bobby, a young black man trapped in a self-perpetuating cycle of hatred, incarceration, and bloodshed. On his first day out of prison, he comes back to the streets of South Central LA and the only family he knows --the gang. He finds that his best friend Ray-Ray (Byron Keith Minns) is now the leader of the Deuces. Ray-Ray, with plenty of sweet talk, easily talks Bobby into committing a murder, killing a rival gang leader. But before the killing Bobby finds that his girlfriend Carole (LaRita Shelby) has given birth to his son. He also sees that she is becoming too dependent on her drug supply. After the killing, Bobby is hauled back into jail for a ten-year stretch. In jail, Bobby undergoes a transformation. Introduced to the Muslim community and mentored by an older convict named Ali (Carl Lumbly), Bobby begins to read W.E.B. Du Bois and Martin Luther King. He learns about self-respect and how gangs use people like him. When he is once again released from prison, Bobby is a new man. But South Central has gone from bad to worse. Carole, now completely addicted to cocaine, works as a hooker to support her habit. He also discovers that Ray-Ray has recruited his 10-year-old son Jimmie (Christian Coleman) as a junior gang member, stealing car stereos. Jimmie looks upon Ray-Ray as a role model and Bobbie must find a way to save his child from the violent and doomed future of a gang member(n)

programme.title: Life or Something like It
programme.desc: A TV reporter sets out to change her ways after a homeless psychic tells her that she has only a week to live(n)

programme.title: Shrink
programme.desc: Following a personal tragedy, successful Hollywood shrink Dr Henry Carter sinks into booze and pot addiction as he struggles to deal with his problems and those of his patients. Comedy drama(n)

programme.title: Out on a Limb
programme.desc: Manhattan stockbroker Bill Campbell is just about to sew up the biggest deal of his life when he gets a call from his younger sister, who reckons that her stepfather is involved in something crooked. So on his way to complete the multi-million dollar deal, Bill agrees to stop by in the backward town of Buzzsaw to comfort his sister. But then things start to go wrong - he's kidnapped by an armed redhead named Sally, who deprives him of his clothes, his car and, most crucially, the wallet which contains the 'phone number Bill needs to finish his business transaction. Now he has just 24 hours to get his possessions back before his chances of becoming rich and famous evaporate forever. And in the slow-paced, slow-witted town of Buzzsaw, help is not exactly in abundance!(n)

programme.title: Strictly Business
programme.desc: Comedy about two very different black men working their way up the corporate ladder. Waymon (Joseph C Phillips) is an Ivy League graduate who is now working his way up the ranks of a major New York company. He befriends Bobby (Tommy Davidson), who works in the company's post room, although the pair have very little in common. When Waymon first notices the stunning Natalie (Halle Berry), he begins to realise that Bobby - who is a friend of hers - could be of some use to him after all(n)

programme.title: Jackie Brown
programme.desc: A flight attendant caught smuggling arms money is pressured to inform on her boss... but she has plans of her own. Director Quentin Tarantino takes Elmore Leonard's novel 'Rum Punch' as its source material. Pam Grier, Samuel L. Jackson, Robert Forster, Bridget Fonda, Michael Keaton, Robert De Niro, Michael Bowen, Chris Tucker, Lisa Gay Hamilton(n)

programme.title: Dracula Untold
programme.desc: A former warrior surrenders his soul in order to save his family in this Dracula origins story(n)

programme.title: Vacation
programme.desc: In this installment of the "Vacation" series, the youngest son of the Griswold clan, now grown with a family of his own, sets out to re-create a cross-country road trip from his youth to an amusement park(n)

programme.title: Ballers
programme.desc: Elidee. Vernon's advised to keep mum about how he got injured; Spencer and Joe clash over the handling of a client as they fend off Andre's threats; Charles isn't sure he's ready for a new challenge; Ricky thinks about relocating(n)

programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: A Texas congressman uses his influence to supply Afghan fighters with money and arms in their battle against Soviet occupiers in the 1980s. Based on a true story(n)

programme.title: True Story
programme.desc: A disgraced journalist plays a game of cat and mouse with an accused murderer who assumed his identity while on the run(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Ted (voice of Seth MacFarlane) ties the knot with Tami-Lynn (Jessica Barth), and recruits his best friend John (Mark Wahlberg) as a sperm donor in order to start a family in this sequel to the comedy hit about a teddy bear come to life. Later, when the Commonwealth of Massachusetts demands that Ted appear before a judge to prove he's a real person, the frisky bear and his pal vow to fight for their civil rights. Morgan Freeman and Amanda Seyfried co-star(n)

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: "Trainspotting" director Danny Boyle mines new veins of horror in this apocalyptic thriller about a deadly viral outbreak and the resilient Londoners trying to survive in a world of infected, flesh-eating zombies. Cillian Murphy, Naomie Harris, Brendan Gleeson, Christopher Eccleston, Noah Huntley(n)

programme.title: Screwed
programme.desc: Comedy about a disgruntled chauffeur who kidnaps his boss' beloved dog but finds himself being suspected as the victim in the case when the canny canine gets away. When the dog returns home, the mistress becomes convinced that it is the chauffeur himself who is the victim of a terrible crime(n)

programme.title: Being There
programme.desc: Black comedy about American gullibility in which a withdrawn old man, appropriately called Chance, is seized upon as some kind of oracle. His elevation to the status of a national celebrity is triggered by a road accident, in which Chance finds himself under a car driven by the wife of a political kingmaker. Soon his charm and honesty have won him the ears of people in the highest public offices(n)

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: Dark, brooding interpretation of the story of Gotham City's Caped Crusader - alter ego of millionaire Bruce Wayne - and his battle with the evil Joker. In an attempt to avenge the violent death of his parents, Wayne fights to rid the city of crime and, in particular, his nemesis the Joker. But his defences come down when an attractive journalist tries to track down the truth behind sightings of a huge bat-like figure in the sky(n)

programme.title: Outcast (?)
programme.desc: What Lurks Within(n)

programme.title: Outcast (?)
programme.desc: What Lurks Within(n)

programme.title: What We Do in the Shadows (?)
The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
programme.desc: In the exciting final chapter of "The Hobbit" series, Bilbo Baggins and his traveling companions get caught up in a war that threatens to destroy all of Middle Earth

programme.title: Eastern Promises
programme.desc: A naïve midwife working at a London hospital becomes entangled with Russian mobsters in this crime thriller

programme.title: Wonder Woman
programme.desc: Princess Diana transforms into Wonder Woman and battles Ares to save her people in this action-packed animated adventure featuring the voice of Keri Russell as the Amazonian superheroine. Other voices include Nathan Fillion, Alfred Molina, Rosario Dawson and Virginia Madsen

programme.title: Village of the Damned
programme.desc: John Carpenter's remake of the 1960 classic about the takeover of a town by telepathic children. Christopher Reeve, Kirstie Alley. Jill: Linda Kozlowski. Frank: Michael Pare. Melanie: Meredith Salenger. Rev. George: Mark Hamill. From the novel "The Midwich Cuckoos."

programme.title: Sinister 2
programme.desc: After moving to an old farmhouse with their mother, two young brothers must defend themselves against a malevolent spirit that feeds on the corruption of innocence, and that documents its exploits in home movies

programme.title: The Last Witch Hunter
programme.desc: An immortal witch hunter faces off against the Queen Witch who has returned from the dead in a battle where the fate of humanity hangs in the balance

programme.title: The Specialist
programme.desc: Hit action film with Sylvester Stallone, a bomb expert, and Sharon Stone who asks him to avenge her family's murder

programme.title: Stanhope
programme.desc: A teen in New York City gets caught up in crime as he tries to help his mom support the family

programme.title: Hitman
programme.desc: A genetically-engineered assassin finds himself on the run after he is double-crossed on a mission in Russia in this stylized adaptation of the popular video game

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: Muddled mix of action and politics centering on an elite group of FBI agents who clash with local authorities in Saudi Arabia while investigating a terrorist bombing of a Western housing compound

programme.title: The Place Beyond the Pines
programme.desc: A shiftless bank robber looking to provide for his family crosses paths with an ambitious cop during a heist, changing both of their lives forever

programme.title: Outcast
programme.desc: What Lurks Within. Rev. Anderson becomes increasingly alienated; Sidney's revelation stuns Kyle

programme.title: Kiss the Girls
programme.desc: Gary Fleder's thriller, based on James Patterson's novel, stars Morgan Freeman in his first outing as forensic psychologist Alex Cross. Called in to track the kidnapper and killer of young girls, he's joined by Dr Kate McTiernan, who has escaped the killer's dungeon. The investigation gets personal when his niece Naomi is kidnapped

programme.title: Hitman: Agent 47
programme.desc: A mysterious, superhuman assassin teams with a young woman to take down a major corporation plotting to use his genetic makeup to create a race of unstoppable killers

programme.title: Batman Returns
programme.desc: In this first sequel to 1989's Batman, the Caped Crusader (Michael Keaton) is up against the Penguin (Danny DeVito), the hideously deformed scion of a wealthy Gotham City family. The Penguin plots with evil businessman Max Schreck (Christopher Walken) to become mayor and then turn Gotham into a cathedral of crime. Upon overhearing these plans, Schreck's mousy secretary Selena Kyle (Michelle Pfeiffer) is tossed from a high-rise window by her boss. Rescued by a covey of kittens, Selena transforms into the leather-clad Catwoman. In this guise, she teams with the Penguin and Schreck to divvy up their ill-gotten gains and help discredit Batman-but she also has her own scores to settle. Paul "Pee-Wee Herman" Reubens, Vincent Schiavelli and Jan Hooks play significant bits, while Pat Hingle and Michael Gough make returns as, respectively, Commissioner Gordon and Alfred the Butler(n)

programme.title: Excalibur
programme.desc: The myth of King Arthur brought once again to the screen. Arthur Pendragon is given the mystical sword Excalibur by the wizard Merlyn. At his death Arthur buries the sword in a stone(n)

programme.title: Balls of Fury
programme.desc: Down-and-out former professional ping-pong phenom, Randy Daytona, is sucked into a maelstrom when FBI Agent Ernie Rodriguez recruits him for a secret mission. Randy is determined to bounce back and win, and to smoke out his father's killer -- arch-fiend Feng(n)

programme.title: An American Haunting
programme.desc: The wind whispers ominous warnings of death before a malevolent entity arrives to claim the life of a young girl as director Courtney Solomon brings author Brent Monahan's chilling, fact-based story of supernatural murder to the screen in this tale of terror starring Donald Sutherland and Sissy Spacek. The year is 1818 and the Bell family is a quiet clan residing on a remote farm in Red River, TN. A normal, loving family by all accounts, the uneventful lives of the Bell family begin to take a dark turn when strange noises around the farm are followed by the arrival of a black wolf with piercing yellow eyes said to strike unspeakable fear into the very soul of all who encounter it. As the sadistic spirit singles out the youngest daughter of the Bell family for torment and her frightened parents search frantically for a rational explanation to the chilling events unfolding in their once-happy home, an eerie, disembodied voice promises death from beyond the grave. With the struggle rapidly turning violent and the Bells' desperate prayers for mercy going unanswered time and again, the shocking murder that followed would prove the only case in recorded American history where the death of a human being was directly attributed to an attack by an evil entity or spirit(n)

programme.title: Lady in the Water
programme.desc: M. Night Shyamalan writes and directs this self-proclaimed, grown-up "bedtime story" about an apartment building superintendent named Cleveland (Paul Giamatti) who discovers a magical sea-nymph named Story (Bryce Dallas Howard) who's been transported to this world and is living in the building's own swimming pool. As this bizarre revelation sinks in, Cleveland becomes enraptured by her other-worldly charm. As he shelters her in his apartment, other inhabitants of the building begin falling into place as representations of characters from an Eastern myth in which these mermaids, or "narfs," co-exist unhappily with more beastly and violent characters. In human reality, the forces of darkness that threaten the heroes of a fairy tale prove to be much more terrifying, and the victory of good over evil is by no means guaranteed. Jeffery Wright, Jared Harris and Mary Beth Hurt co-star, as well as Shyamalan himself, playing the visionary writer Vick(n)

programme.title: Hard to Kill
programme.desc: Steven Seagal stars as a 'go it alone' cop, gunned down at home. After a seven year coma, the man vows revenge on the intruders who killed his wife and left him for dead(n)

programme.title: Under Siege
programme.desc: A fearsome group of terrorists seize control of an American battleship in this popular action film. What they do not know is that the ship's cook is a former Navy SEAL commando and an expert warrior, who is determined to defeat the terrorists and regain control of the ship(n)

programme.title: Innerspace
programme.desc: Soon after pilot Tuck Pendleton and his craft are miniaturised in a scientific experiment, thieves try to steal the technology used, so a scientist injects Tuck into the nearest available body - which turns out to be that of hypochondriac Jack Putter. Now Tuck and Jack must work together to foil the criminals and extract Tuck before his oxygen runs out(n)

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Slinky space queen Serleena plots extra-terrestrial destruction and Agent J is going to need help. The only one who knows Serleena's secret is K, who's now a postal official with no knowledge of his former life. Can J persuade a reluctant K to put on the black suit for more alien-busting? Sci-fi comedy(n)

programme.title: Self/less
programme.desc: A dying New York real-estate tycoon undergoes a top-secret procedure to transfer his consciousness into the body of a healthy young man, but he discovers that his new life isn't what he expected after severing ties to his old one and learning about the mysterious origins of his new body(n)

programme.title: Blood Diamond
programme.desc: In the role that gave him his third Academy Award nomination, Leonardo DiCaprio stars Blood Diamond as a mercenary who wishes to transform his life by finding a rare pink diamond. In his quest, he is joined by Solomon Vandy, a man who was taken from his family, forced to work in the diamond fields. Sharing completely different life stories but united for the same purpose, both men embark on a trek through rebel territory, in a journey that could save Solomon's family and give Archer a second chance. Jennifer Connelly plays an American journalist whose idealism is tempered by a deepening connection with Archer(n)

programme.title: Black Rain
programme.desc: An unconventional New York cop is assigned to escort a Japanese criminal back to his home country in this stylish action film. When the prisoner escapes, the cop must work with a reluctant Japanese police force and deal with the vicious yakuza in order to recapture him(n)

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: A suburban wife meets a book dealer on a Manhattan street and begins a torrid affair with the handsome young stranger. Her husband, however, grows suspicious and confronts her lover, a decision that radically alters their lives(r)

programme.title: Gone Girl
programme.desc: Man comes under suspicion when his wife disappears(r)

programme.title: The Main Event
programme.desc: Seven years after What's Up, Doc?, Barbra Streisand and Ryan O'Neal teamed again for this similar romantic comedy in which a makeup executive invests in the contract of a boxer. After he retires and she becomes bankrupt, the two team up as prizefighter and sparkplug/manager to recover their earlier fortunes(r)

programme.title: El Cantante
programme.desc: A zesty soundtrack spices up this stirring but tragic profile of pioneering Latino salsa singer Hector Lavoe (Marc Anthony), who was popular in the 1960s, '70s and '80s. Jennifer Lopez, Anthony's real-life wife, costars as his spouse, and the cinematic sparks fly when the two are onscreen. Lopez also served as producer. Directed by Leon Ichaso, who co-wrote the script with David Darmstaedter and Todd Anthony Bello. John Ortiz, Manny Perez, Federico Castelluccio, Vincent Laresca, Romi Diaz(r)

programme.title: Evan Almighty
programme.desc: Congressman Evan Baxter is settling into a new life of political importance when God appears and tells him to build an ark. Evan thinks he's going mad, but before long, animals and deliveries of wood persuade him that it might be his destiny to be the modern-day Noah after all(r)

programme.title: Matchstick Men
programme.desc: Offbeat crime comedy. Obsessive-compulsive con artist Roy and his ambitious protege Frank are on the verge of pulling off a lucrative swindle when Roy's life is suddenly complicated by the unexpected arrival of his teenage daughter. While her appearance threatens to disrupt his carefully ordered life, he comes to feel fatherly affection for her - and she in turn develops a fascination with his work(r)

programme.title: Run All Night
programme.desc: A former mob hit man is haunted by his life of crime. But when his estranged son is marked to be killed, he's forced to turn against his former employers, including an aging crime boss who's also his best friend(r)

programme.title: Focus
programme.desc: A con artist takes on an inexperienced apprentice, but struggles to keep his eyes on the prize when he develops romantic feelings for her(r)

programme.title: Cop Land
programme.desc: Sylvester Stallone puts in an acclaimed performance as the sheriff of the small town of Garrison, New Jersey, home for a group of corrupt New York cops who find themselves under investigation in this richly characterised thriller. Freddy Heflin is a small town sheriff who is in awe of the many New York cops who live in, and effectively run, his town, led by Uncle Ray (Harvey Keitel). He is forced to re-evaluate his opinion of these men, and of his own worth, when Internal Affairs officer Moe Tilden (Robert De Niro) comes to town and tries to recruit him into an investigation into their activities. Tilden is convincing, but the question remains, will the exhausted and self-loathing Heflin find the moral courage to battle the very people he has revered for so long, or will his apathy and world-weariness prove unconquerable? Either way, it will prove a difficult journey(r)

programme.title: Field of Dreams
programme.desc: Beloved uplifting drama with Kevin Costner on a heavenly mission to build a baseball field(r)

programme.title: Kill the Messenger
programme.desc: Jeremy Renner stars as a journalist who is tormented by a vicious smear campaign after he exposes a CIA scandal. Absorbing biographical drama with Rosemarie DeWitt. (2014)(108 mins)(r)

programme.title: John Wick
programme.desc: Retired hit man John Wick returns to the fray to punish the gangsters who destroyed his life(r)

programme.title: Just Married
programme.desc: Romantic comedy in which a newlywed couple on honeymoon in Europe discover that the girl's disapproving family and ex-boyfriend are following them in an attempt to sabotage their relationship. (HD)(n)

programme.title: Point of No Return
programme.desc: A junkie is trained to become an assassin by the government in exchange for not being executed after killing a police officer in a drug-induced haze. As she adjusts to her new life, something goes disastrously wrong with a hit, and now she doesn't know whom to trust(n)

programme.title: Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: In the year 2029, an astronaut whose unauthorised mission to rescue a chimp companion from a mysterious space storm crash-lands on a planet where apes rule and humans are sold into slavery(n)

programme.title: Grumpy Old Men
programme.desc: Two neighbours, who have been bitter rivals ever since a youthful feud over a woman, renew their animosity when an attractive widow moves in across the street. The new arrival is a welcome diversion for the old adversaries, and when they both attempt to woo her, only one can win her affections. When it becomes clear that the widow is interested only in commitment and her new lover has other ideas, she begins to doubt her original decision(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding
programme.desc: Sick of being bullied by her overpowering Greek family, dowdy Toula signs up for college. Despite every warning, Toula falls for a non-Greek guy, and it's not easy getting her clan to accept him(n)

programme.title: The Hobbit: The Battle of the Five Armies
programme.desc: In the exciting final chapter of "The Hobbit" series, Bilbo Baggins and his traveling companions get caught up in a war that threatens to destroy all of Middle Earth(n)

programme.title: The Kingdom
programme.desc: Muddled mix of action and politics centering on an elite group of FBI agents who clash with local authorities in Saudi Arabia while investigating a terrorist bombing of a Western housing compound(n)

programme.title: Miller's Crossing
programme.desc: Joel and Ethan Coen's third collaboration, the gangster film Miller's Crossing, stars Gabriel Byrne as Tom Reagan, the right-hand man of big-city Irish mob boss Leo (Albert Finney). The film opens with Italian mobster Johnny Caspar (Jon Polito) and his second in command Eddie Dane (J.E. Freeman) informing Leo and Tom that they are going to kill bookie Bernie Bernbaum (John Turturro) because he has been revealing Caspar's fixed fights to other gamblers. Leo informs Caspar that Bernie pays for protection and is not to be touched. After the Italians leave in a huff, Tom informs Leo that he should give up Bernie. Tom and Leo are both involved with Verna (Marcia Gay Harden), Bernie's sister. After a failed hit on Leo starts a full-scale mob war, Tom reveals to Leo the truth about his relationship with Verna. This leads to a falling-out between the pair. Tom goes to work for Caspar, but in truth, he is still loyal to Leo. Tom figures out how to manipulate all of the situations so that Leo survives, but this may cost Tom his relationship with Verna(n)

programme.title: Life Is Beautiful
programme.desc: The film revolves around a Jewish man named Guido Orefice in Italy. Witty and comical, he falls in love with Dora, a beautiful young woman. They get married and have a son named Joshua. Their life comes to a tragic halt when they are picked up for a Nazi concentration camp. Guido decides to hide the real situation from his son and makes him believe that they are in the camp to play games and have fun(n)

programme.title: Magnolia
programme.desc: Paul Thomas Anderson's ambitious, Oscar-nominated star-studded film follows the lives of a group of friends in San Fernando Valley, L.a. In the course of just one day, their lives are sometimes seen to inter-connect through friendship or family, sometimes are seen in isolation. Among those starring are Tom Cruise, Jason Robards, William H Macy, Julianne Moore and Melora Walters(n)

programme.title: Fracture
programme.desc: Anthony Hopkins, Ryan Gosling and David Strathairn star in Gregory Hoblit's twist-filled legal drama. When top airplane engineer Ted Crawford discovers that his wife has been cheating on him he takes a devastatingly direct route to revenge: he drives home and shoots his errant spouse in the face. He then waits for the police to turn up and confesses to the crime. With his wife in a coma, Crawford is arrested and enters the justice system. It should, of course, be the simplest prosecution ever. And lawyer Willy Beachum can be forgiven for thinking that his last case as a criminal attorney (before he switches to company law) is set to be a doddle. However, once the case comes to court, Crawford, representing himself, proceeds to tear apart the ample evidence that's stacked against him. Can he possibly get away with his crime? Also starring Rosamund Pike, Billy Burke and Fiona Shaw(n)

programme.title: The Place Beyond the Pines
programme.desc: An idle bank robber looking to provide for his family crosses paths with an ambitious cop during a heist, changing both of their lives forever(n)

programme.title: The Stranger
programme.desc: Orson Welles, Edward G Robinson and Loretta Young star in this 1946 thriller about a US Government agent who is assigned to head a manhunt for a disguised Nazi war criminal who is believed to be hiding in a small town(n)

programme.title: Confessions of a Nazi Spy
programme.desc: Classic anti-Nazi drama starring Edward G Robinson as determined G-Man who leads the operation to search out and smash a major German spy ring in the United States(n)

programme.title: Beauty for the Asking
programme.desc: According to RKO Radio's publicity folks, Beauty for the Asking was supposed to have been an expose of the lucrative beauty-parlor "racket". What emerged on screen, however, was a pedestrian romantic triangle involving socialite Denny Williams (Patric Knowles), his wealthy wife Flora (Frieda Inescort), and pretty beautician Jean Russell (Lucille Ball). Spurned by Williams, Jean finds consolation by developing a revolutionary facial cream that makes her a millionairess. Ironically, her financial backer in this endeavor is none other than her romantic rival Flora. Among the screenwriters was Paul Jarrico, later blacklisted for his allegedly Communistic sentiments; the only thing remotely radical in Beauty for the Asking, however, is the notion that 28-year-old Lucille Ball could play a cosmetic tycoon(n)

programme.title: Next Time I Marry
programme.desc: An heiress can only obtain a multimillion-dollar inheritance by marrying an American citizen, and despite being in love with a handsome foreigner, she ties the knot with the first man she comes across, who happens to be a ditchdigger. On their way to Nevada to get a quickie divorce, the newlyweds realize that they've fallen in love(n)

programme.title: A Girl, a Guy and a Gob (?)
A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur's Court (?)
Power
programme.desc: I Got This on Lock. Ghost sees an opportunity to take the clubs to the next level, but the past may catch up to him; Tommy joins Tasha in a scheme, while dealing with an uncontrollable contact

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Thank-You Note. Reggie and Missy debate the importance of manners and social etiquette after meeting a wealthy Atlanta couple

programme.title: Deliverance
programme.desc: Four Atlanta businessmen have no idea what's in store for them when they embark on a canoeing expedition in the wilds of Appalachia. The foursome make the fatal error of wandering into the terrain controlled by families of degenerate hillbillies. Terrorized by the mountain men, the vacationers attempt to escape

programme.title: Whiplash
programme.desc: A young jazz drummer is driven to the brink of insanity by his ruthless music teacher. If the talented drummer can just keep it together, he might be bound for greatness

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Three childhood friends who get together every Christmas Eve plan one last epic night out to celebrate the end of an era

programme.title: The Edge
programme.desc: Survival drama in which a billionaire travels with his wife and her favourite photographer to Alaska for a fashion shoot. On their arrival, the two men become stranded in the wilderness and find themselves being pursued by a ferocious bear. As they fight for their very lives, one man becomes convinced that the other is plotting his death

programme.title: Into the Grizzly Maze
programme.desc: In this tense thriller Rowman (James Marsden) arrives at his childhood home in Alaska to pay respects to his late father. He's joined by his brother, Beckett (Thomas Jane) a local law enforcement officer who has just witnessed a bloody scene involving two bootleg cutters who were killed by a grizzly. In an attempt to stop the bear, Douglass (Billy Bob Thornton) an experienced tracker is dispatched into the forest to locate the creature. As the parties converge, they discover that something is mysteriously driving the bears out of the maze. When a grizzly turns his attention to the group, they realize they are the ones being hunted. Directed by David Hackl

programme.title: Poltergeist II: The Other Side
programme.desc: The Freeling family is once again spooked by supernatural forces in this sequel to the 1982 blockbuster. JoBeth Williams, Craig T. Nelson, Heather O'Rourke. Robbie: Oliver Robins. Tangina: Zelda Rubinstein. Taylor: Will Sampson. Kane: Julian Beck. Gramma: Geraldine Fitzgerald. Brian Gibson directed

programme.title: The Right Stuff
programme.desc: Stirring screen version of Tom Wolfe's book about the birth of the American space programme. The astronauts battle against bureaucracy, family dilemmas and their own doubts in their struggle to win the space race on behalf of their government and their country

programme.title: The Lady in the Van
programme.desc: In this heartfelt comedy-drama, a homeless woman parks her van in the driveway of playwright Alan Bennett's house, and lives there for 15 years. Over the course of her stay, the two form a unique friendship. Based on a true story that became a hit stage play in 1999(n)

programme.title: Senseless
programme.desc: Broad comedy about a financially-insecure economics graduate who agrees to participate in a drug trial. The drug in question enhances the subject's senses, and he uses his newly-developed powers to get ahead in business. For a while, he enjoys the good life - but then the drug begins to show some unusual side effects(n)

programme.title: Redbelt
programme.desc: Writer-director David Mamet's riveting drama touches on the worlds of mixed martial arts, Hollywood and shady con men. Chiwetel Ejiofor gives a knock-out performance as a jujitsu instructor who gets conned into fighting in a money bout after getting backed into a financial corner. Mamet is a practitioner of jujitsu. Alice Braga, Tim Allen, Ricky Jay, Joe Mantegna. Mixed-martial-arts fighter Randy Couture costars(n)

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: Accomplished mall security guard Paul Blart discovers a heist plot while attending an expo in Las Vegas. His investigative prowess is needed to foil the robbery and arrest those responsible(n)

programme.title: Still Alice
programme.desc: Linguistics professor Alice Howland finds her relationships with her husband and three children tested when she is diagnosed with early-onset Alzheimer's disease(n)

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: This sports-drama centres on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football(n)

programme.title: Power
programme.desc: I Got This on Lock. Ghost sees an opportunity to take the clubs to the next level, but the past may catch up to him; Tommy joins Tasha in a scheme, while dealing with an uncontrollable contact(n)

programme.title: Paul Blart: Mall Cop 2
programme.desc: Accomplished mall security guard Paul Blart discovers a heist plot while attending an expo in Las Vegas. His investigative prowess is needed to foil the robbery and arrest those responsible(n)

programme.title: Snow Dogs
programme.desc: Miami dentist Ted Brooks is delighted to hear that he has been named his mother's will, and travels to Alaska to claim his inheritance. But he discovers his new property is slightly unusual: he now owns a team of sled dogs. It turns out his mother was an Alaskan sled-racing champion! Another shock awaits Ted in the frozen wastes: his real dad is a grumpy old white man who's only interested in Ted's dogs. The fun comes as thick and fast as a blizzard when Ted decides to gain his dad's respect by defending his mother's title. The only trouble is, he's never raced sled dogs in his life... Two Oscar winners come together in this hilarious movie, as Cuba Gooding Jr plays the dentist who spends a lot of his time up to his waist in snow, while James Coburn is his father, who's out to get his son's inheritance. Laughter comes in flurries as Gooding proves how cool he is, in a very different way from his normal roles!(n)

programme.title: The Day After Tomorrow
programme.desc: A climatologist tries to figure out a way to save the world from abrupt global warming. He must get to his young son in New York, which is being taken over by a new ice age(n)

programme.title: Concussion
programme.desc: This sports-drama centres on the research conducted by forensic neuropathologist that raised public awareness about Chronic Traumatic Encephalopathy resulting from such high-impact sports as professional football(n)

programme.title: Survivor's Remorse
programme.desc: The Night of the Crash. In the Season 3 premiere, the clan deals with the loss of a family member(n)

programme.desc: I Got This on Lock(n)

programme.title: Testament of Youth
programme.desc: Free-spirited Vera Brittain overcomes adversity too win a scholarship to Oxford. While there, she falls in love with Roland Leighton and they begin to pursue their dreams together. But, the onset of World War I rips them apart, and Vera learns first hand the horrors and atrocities of war

programme.title: The Fourth Kind
programme.desc: Set in the fall of 2000 and purportedly based on actual events, The Fourth Kind stars Milla Jovovich as Dr. Abigail Tyler, a Nome, Alaska-based psychotherapist whose videotaped sessions with her patients offer the most compelling evidence of alien abduction ever documented. Elias Koteas and Will Patton co-star

programme.title: The Story of Us
programme.desc: Two jilted lovers spend fifteen years of marriage together, only to find that they might no longer love each other. In this time they have two children and go through the various (dramatic and comical) events that take place in an average marriage

programme.title: Red Army
programme.desc: An entertaining look at the Soviet Union's national hockey team and their decades of success in the sport. The filmmakers also profile superstar player Slava Fetisov, who turned to politics after his hockey career

programme.title: Postcards from the Edge
programme.desc: Meryl Streep stars as an actress who rebuilds her life after drug rehab with the help of her overbearing mother. Based on Carrie Fisher's autobiographical novel

programme.title: CJ7
programme.desc: Shaolin Soccer and Kung Fu Hustle director Stephen Chow returns to the helm for this sci-fi comedy about a struggling single father whose quest to find the perfect toy yields out-of-this-world results. Ti (Chow) is a poor construction worker who breaks his back to ensure that his young son Dicky (Xu Jiao) can stay enrolled in an exclusive private school. But while Ti does everything possible to give his son the opportunities that he never had, Dicky still feels like a classroom reject due to his tattered clothes and lack of the latest toys. Dicky's classmates all play with the coolest and most expensive gadgets that money can buy, so how is a kid who gets his toys from the local junkyard ever supposed to fit in? One day, while scrounging through the trash heap in search of a new toy, Ti discovers a mysterious orb and brings it straight back to Dicky. Though at first the "CJ7" appears to be little more than an unidentifiable oddity, it proves to be much, much more once the young boy starts to play with it. This isn't your average action figure, but a living "pet" with extraordinary powers. Realizing that his new toy may be just the thing to help him fit in with his demanding classmates, Dicky brings the CJ7 to school with him in order to show it off and have some fun. But the CJ7 has its own ideas about how to have fun, and it isn't long before the situation at school gets hopelessly out of hand

programme.title: The Emperor's Club
programme.desc: In this rewarding drama, Kevin Kline gives a stellar performance as a dedicated teacher at a boys prep school, circa 1976. Kline's Mr. Hundert doesn't just teach his students about Roman and Greek history, he offers them lessons in life, morality and character. But when an unruly transfer student enters his classroom, Mr. Hundert's resolve is seriously tested. Emile Hirsch, Rob Morrow

programme.title: Miss Meadows
programme.desc: A prim and proper teacher becomes a rampaging vigilante in this powerhouse drama

programme.title: Boiler Room
programme.desc: In this drama that explores greed and corruption in American business, Giovanni Ribisi plays Seth Davis, an intelligent and ambitious college dropout who runs a casino in his apartment. Eager to show his father that he can succeed, Seth lands a job with a small stock brokerage firm. He is given a space in the company's "boiler room," where he makes cold calls to prospective clients. As it turns out, Seth has a genuine talent for cold calling, which gains him the approval of his superiors, the admiration of his father, and the attentions of one of his co-workers, Abby Hilliard (Nia Long). However, the higher up the ladder Seth rises, the deeper he sinks into a quagmire of dirty dealings, until he's breaking the law in order to keep his bosses happy and his paychecks coming. The Boiler Room also features Tom Everett Scott, Scott Caan, Jamie Kennedy, Nicky Katt, and Ben Affleck in a cameo as the headhunter who brings Seth into the firm. Ribisi and Scott also appeared together in That Thing You Do; Ribisi was the drummer replaced by Scott, who then led The One-Ders to fictional pop stardom

programme.title: Red Army
programme.desc: An entertaining look at the Soviet Union's national hockey team and their decades of success in the sport. The filmmakers also profile superstar player Slava Fetisov, who turned to politics after his hockey career

programme.title: Testament of Youth

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: The Way Out. Claire uses her medical skills to escape Castle Leoch, and with help from Jamie, tends to a sick child. Later, during the evening entertainment, Claire listens to a tale that offers her hope for freedom

programme.title: Outlander
programme.desc: The Gathering. Claire plots to escape during the Castle's Gathering ceremony, but encounters with Jamie and a drunken Dougal alter her plans

programme.title: Drugstore Cowboy
programme.desc: American independent filmmaker Gus Van Sant's powerful, much-admired drama of drug-addiction, centred on addict Bob who leads his "crew" - wife Dianne, henchman Rick and his girlfriend Nadine - on a series of robberies in the Pacific Northwest. Wide

programme.title: Miss Meadows
programme.desc: A prim and proper teacher becomes a rampaging vigilante in this powerhouse drama

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens mistake images of 1980s arcade games as a sign of aggression, they attack Earth with evil versions of video-game characters in this wild action comedy. In response, the U.S. president asks his old gamer pals to battle the invaders

programme.title: Brüno
programme.desc: Sacha Baron Cohen follows up his outrageous PC-busting mockumentary Borat... with this outrageous PC-busting mockumentary about a disgraced gay Austrian fashion journalist seeking fame and fortune in the US of A. Following a disastrous incident involving a Velcro jump suit at Milan Fashion Week, Brüno is fired from his TV show Funkyzeit mit Brüno, turns his back on the fashion, and heads off to America, hoping to become more famous than Hitler (though for different reasons, naturally). Once Stateside, his in-your-face uber-campness and total lack of self-awareness proceeds to shock, horrify and infuriate everyone he encounters - from a black TV audience, to whom he reveals his adopted African baby, via various homophobic bigots, to a memorable meeting with a Texan Congressman (who's probably still having nightmares about it). And, not willing to stop there, Brüno decides to jet off to the Middle East to solve the Arab/ Israeli conflict - to the utter horror of both parties, and risking injury or worse himself. Opinions are divided over whether Brüno is out to expose the idiocy of homophobia, or whether he's simply using it for laughs. However, there is consensus that this is a very, very funny film, albeit one not for the faint-hearted(r)

programme.title: The Wash
programme.desc: This throwback to the frolicsome comedies of the 1970s is from writer/director D.J. Pooh, creator of Friday (1995) and 3 Strikes (2000). Dr. Dre stars as Sean, who's financially strapped and on the verge of losing his home and his car until his roommate Dee Loc Snoop Dogg suggests he join him as an employee at the local car wash. Tensions mount between the pals when the establishment's eccentric owner Mr. Washington (George Wallace) promotes the more mature and responsible Sean over Dee Loc, and Sean is subsequently forced to crack down on his scamming buddy's side hustles and locker room assignations with female co-workers. When their boss is kidnapped, however, Sean and Dee Loc must work together to save their employer, their jobs, and their friendship. Angell Conwell and Tom "Tiny" Lister Jr. co-star in this urban farce flavored with a hip-hop soundtrack(n)

programme.title: October Sky
programme.desc: The Russians have sent a satellite into space. Meanwhile, four American schoolboys, intent on leaving their small mining town, design a rocket for a local science fair. Laura Dern stars as a school teacher

programme.title: Johnson Family Vacation
programme.desc: Comedian Cedric the Entertainer serves as both producer and star of this comedy about a family who discovers just how much can go wrong en route to a family get-together. When Nate Johnson (Cedric the Entertainer) is invited to a big family reunion in Missouri, he sees it as an opportunity to reconnect with his estranged wife and growing children, as well as a chance to show up his wealthier know-it-all brother, Mack (Steve Harvey). Nate takes delivery on an expensive new SUV, persuades his recently separated wife, Dorothy (Vanessa L. Williams), to tag along, and packs up his three kids -- nubile teenager Nikki (Solange Knowles), under-age wannabe rapper D.J. (Bow Wow), and precocious seven-year-old Destiny (Gabby Soleil) -- for what he imagines will be a leisurely drive from Los Angeles to St. Louis. However, between his wary wife, arguing kids, angry police officers, bizarre hitchhikers, bad diner food, and an unfortunate run-in with a cement mixer, getting from point A to point B proves to be just short of a nightmare. Johnson Family Vacation was the first feature film for director Christopher Erskin, who previously distinguished himself directing music videos for the likes of Missy Elliot, TLC, and Boyz II Men

programme.title: Supercross
programme.desc: Charged performances by Steve Howey and Mike Vogel kick-start this high-octane thrill ride about driven motorcycle-racing brothers competing against each other on the professional circuit. K.C. Carlyle (Howey) lands a lucrative sponsorship with a factory team, but younger brother Trip (Vogel), the better rider, must make his way as an independent "privateer." Real-life motocross star Tyler Evans has a cameo as himself. Directed by Steve Boyum. Cameron Richardson, Sophia Bush, Robert Carradine

programme.title: Gotta Catch Santa Claus
programme.desc: William Shatner provides the voice of Santa Claus in this Christmas cartoon featuring vibrantly colored animation and upbeat holiday tunes. The musical adventure follows kids Trevor and Veronica as they attempt to track down jolly old St. Nick (and prove that he exists!) before an ice monster named LeFreeze gets to him first and puts a permanent end to the holiday season

programme.title: Gawayn
programme.desc: Shopping Frenzy. The Questers' old nemesis Spyder seeks revenge when they encounter one another at a local super store

programme.title: Planes: Fire & Rescue
programme.desc: Adventure flies higher than ever before in this sequel that finds championship air-racer Dusty Crophopper (voice of Dane Cook) beginning an exciting new career fighting forest fires. In the wake of another successful racing season, Dusty returns home to Propwash Junction to resume his training. But a debilitating injury forces Rusty to consider a new career path. Before long Rusty is training with the Aerial Fire Fighters at Piston Peak Air Attack Base. Becoming a Single Engine Air Tanker (SEAT) is no simple task for an injured plane, but with the guidance of seasoned fire-and-rescue helicopter Blade Ranger (voice of Ed Harris), fearless leader of the Piston Peak Air Attack team, Rusty is soon soaring through the clouds once again. Meanwhile, as Rusty gets up to speed, his presence in the unit catches the attention of Dipper (voice of Julie Bowen), a cargo hauler-turned-water scooper capable of skimming lake water to combat raging fires. A major racing fan, Dipper can hardly contain her excitement at the prospect of working alongside Rusty, and meanwhile wise, heavy-lift helicopter Windlifter (voice of Wes Studi) has never encountered a fire he couldn't conquer. In no time Rusty has made a whole host of new friends at Piston Peak, including hulking transport plane Cabbie (voice of Dale Dye), the brave grounded firefighters known as the Smokejumpers, the Secretary of the Interior (voice of Fred Willard), and Nick "Loop'n" Lopez (voice of Erik Estrada), a helicopter cop with an illustrious past. And though learning the secrets to dousing forest fires is sure to take time, Rusty is a fast learner, and eager to pitch in

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: An orphan named Ella is treated cruelly by her stepmother and stepsisters, who force her to do menial chores. However, her life changes forever when she meets a prince

programme.title: Alexander and the Terrible, Horrible, No Good, Very Bad Day
programme.desc: Chaos ensues when a family find themselves having the worst day ever!

programme.title: Maleficent
programme.desc: Angelina Jolie stars as the dark fairy who places a terrible curse on the king's daughter in this spectacular fairy tale adventure. With Elle Fanning

programme.title: Monsters, Inc.
programme.desc: A little girl accidentally enters the land of monsters, where she befriends two creatures who work at a "scare factory"

programme.title: Millions
programme.desc: Director Danny Boyle revisits a theme from his Shallow Grave and Trainspotting days -- greed -- but focuses on a much younger protagonist with this comedy drama. Millions opens with recent widower Ronnie (James Nesbitt) moving his two precocious pre-pubescent sons to the suburbs. Missing his mother and the comforts of his old neighborhood, the young Damian (Alex Etel) builds a cardboard-box fort on the outskirts of the suburb, where one day his placid introvert existence is literally crushed by a giant gym bag full of thousands of pounds' worth of cash. Less concerned with the origin of the money than with how to spend it, Damian and his older brother, Anthony (Lewis McGibbon), decide to keep it a secret from their father, which becomes an increasingly tricky proposition as the days pass. His conscience getting in the way of his spending, Damian debates the ethics of his ill-gotten gains with a handful of imaginary saints, and begins to try to spend his cash a little more altruistically. But his charitable deeds inadvertently attract the attention of a mysterious, threatening man who's desperate to get his hands on the money. Marking a distinct change of pace for Boyle after the horror film 28 Days Later, Millions world-premiered at the 2004 Toronto Film Festival

programme.title: Tin Cup
programme.desc: Golfing drama about a washed-up old pro who tries to get back into the big time. Roy 'Tin Cup' McAvoy (Kevin Costner) ruined his career when he took a risk on the golf course which led to his disqualification from the game. Now he teaches golf to others at a driving range in Salome, Texas, with the help of his trusted friend Romeo Posar (Cheech Marin). But McAvoy's life starts to change when a new student walks into the training centre - Dr Molly Griswold (Rene Russo), who just happens to be dating PGA star David Simms (Don Johnson). To win Molly, 'Tin Cup' knows that he must impress her - and what better way than by beating Simms and winning the US Open? The problem, of course, is that 'Tin Cup' has been teaching golf for so long that he may have forgotten how to play!

Series star Patrick Stewart directed this episode, which was scripted by Joe Menosky from a story by Hilary J. Bader. "Hero Worship" was first telecast February 1, 1992

First telecast February 15, 1992, "The Masterpiece Society" was written by James Kahn, Adam Belanoff, and Michael Piller

programme.title: Dragons' Den
programme.desc: Episode 1. The Dragons return to pass their judgement on a toe tapping pitch which sees the panel up on their feet. Also this episode, Deborah Meaden goes for a slightly unconventional joy ride and Peter Jones thinks outside the frame with an offer the Den has never seen before. Will any of the entrepreneurs be able to entice the Dragons and secure that all-important investment?(n)

programme.title: Dragons' Den
programme.desc: Episode 2. The Dragons encounter a colourful Indian dance troupe, the weird and wonderful world of taxidermy and a young Yorkshire duo try to impress Peter Jones by eating their own product - dog food. Will they do enough to secure a deal?(n)

programme.title: Dragons' Den
programme.desc: Episode 3. A couple of university friends pitch their home brew cider kits hoping to leave the Den victorious, and a loose leaf tea company serve up a refreshing treat. The lift encounters a technical malfunction, and a former Economics student hopes to butter up the Dragons with his new nutty preserve. Will anyone walk away with a deal?(n)

programme.title: Dragons' Den
programme.desc: Episode 1. In the series opener, an online property businessman feels the wrath of the Dragons and a yoga instructor tries to bring some much needed zen into the Den. But will any of the entrepreneurs manage to secure some of the Dragons' cash?(n)

programme.title: Dragons' Den
programme.desc: Episode 4. Sticky business in the Den: a product using nano suction technology has the Dragons glued, there's an alarmed LED walking stick, and a marshmallow lover lets the Dragons get sticky fingers with her gourmet treats. For those who overindulge, there is a cycling brand for the larger figure, and the Dragons are invited to play with a new keepy-uppy toy. Will anyone be able to cement a deal?(n)

programme.title: Dragons' Den
programme.desc: Episode 5. Some extraordinary entrants venture into the den. An 18-year-old impresses the Dragons with his garden shed invention. There is also a canine member of Team GB and a rip-roaring entrance from a Kent based gaming entrepeneur. Plus, a couple of likely lads showcase their 'blooming' marvellous greetings product, and the Dragons get a taste of Columbia's finest Cacao. However valuation and contracts prove to be a sticking point - will anyone walk away with a deal?(n)
